text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Spawns commonly during the day. Drops Plant Food.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)"They all make fun of my size, but I always say that it's not the size that matters..."

pages.text: $(#25228d)Their Plant Food make a varied selection of plants.
